Articles.Content: Ok; what is Hamachi and what is port forwarding? I've done basically nothing with PC multiplayer before.
Hamachi is the alternative to Port-Forwarding.
Hamachi is where other people connect to your local network and port fowarding is making your wireless port public(it can be dangerous)

They probably had Hamachi turned off.

Make sure that your firewall is OFF and not just allowing Terraria and all related programs through.

Still not working. I tried this FIRST, obviously.
god when it comes to making servers, its really hard.
It's not that dangerous. I tried following the ReadMe instructions but had trouble finding out what my IP-Equivalent was.

Grumble. So no progress yet here?

Also, can someone give me tips on building good missiles?
My friend uses it all the time I'll check what he says

I wish Spartwo or Zekes would say something about it to help us

Actually we're doing it turn based my computers are worse than Briansuns(and they're schools)
... So how do you know it's worse than mine?
Well my schools computers are better.You have your own which is pretty good,don't you?

Grumble. So no progress yet here?

Also, can someone give me tips on building good missiles?

-Make sure the warhead of the missile is something hard so it'll do more damage when it hits.

-Use the VAB to make them. Then transfer them to where you need them, using the subassembly tab. This is because small missiles need to be rotationally symmetrical so you can put multiple sepratrons on them at a slight angle to make them spin. This doesn't work if you do it in SPH.

-For smart missiles, don't forget to put on a reaction wheel. Big missiles won't be able to steer without one. Also don't forget to add a battery or a generator.

-Copy someone else's missiles. xD
Can i battle someone thats not zekes? he keeps giving me targets in duna witch i dont know how to get to? anyone one up for kerban orbit, sub orbit, or land.sea battle?

Grumble. So no progress yet here?

Also, can someone give me tips on building good missiles?

Spin stabilization is your friend:)

Can i battle someone thats not zekes? he keeps giving me targets in duna witch i dont know how to get to? anyone one up for kerban orbit, sub orbit, or land.sea battle?

Hyperedit is recommended.
SRB or liquid fueled?
Oh ok. But i dont know if that will tick him off or not. But for real anyone up for orbit or land.sea battles?

SRB or liquid fueled?

SRB for close and dumb.Liquid for far and smart.
All of these are terrible ideas, so use them, that way you can never produce better missiles than me.
Can you post pics of a basic design?

Oh ok. But i dont know if that will tick him off or not. But for real anyone up for orbit or land.sea battles?

It won't tick him off for you to do that. He expects you to do it.

Hyper Edit is how we all get things to various locations. It saves time and frustration.
But still. Does anyone else want to battle agaist me?
I want to do an aerial battle with everyone.

These are atmospheric missiles. For space, you don't need wings, and you don't need more than three sepratrons. No air resistance means more speed more quickly and no deceleration once you run out of fuel.

This is what I just happened to have open at the moment.
